name: Prototype Mint B
description:
Created for O2A2 Jam 2021

You have just received a file containing an AI fresh out of the digital oven and ready for its final phase of testing.

The company you work for is awaiting your judgement on whether this little pile of data should continue on to the next step.

  • Under 1000 words, with 2 choices

Mentions of mental health. Nothing really triggering(I think), just a dude.

Music by OtoLogic (CC BY 4.0)

(Thank you for picking up my first game┗| ຶӫ ຶ|┛)
